# This file is automatically generated by running
#
#     cmake/scripts/generate-cmakefiles
#
# Require CMake 2.8
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

set(PROJECT_NAME eikonal.x)               # exacutable name
project(${PROJECT_NAME})

# Set verbose output while testing CMake
#set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE 1)

# Set CMake behavior
cmake_policy(SET CMP0004 OLD)

# Get DOLFIN configuration data (DOLFINConfig.cmake must be in DOLFIN_CMAKE_CONFIG_PATH)
find_package(DOLFIN)

# Default build type (can be overridden by user)
if (NOT CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE)
  set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "RelWithDebInfo" CACHE STRING
    "Choose the type of build, options are: Debug MinSizeRel Release RelWithDebInfo." FORCE)
endif()

# Compiler definitions
add_definitions(${DOLFIN_CXX_DEFINITIONS})

# Add special DOLFIN compiler flags
#set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${DOLFIN_CXX_FLAGS}")

# Include directories
include_directories(${DOLFIN_INCLUDE_DIRS})
include_directories(SYSTEM ${DOLFIN_3RD_PARTY_INCLUDE_DIRS})
include_directories(./eikonal)

# Executabl
add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME}
                               ./main.cpp
                               
                               ./eikonal/la/la_loop.cpp
                               ./eikonal/la/la_stl.cpp
                               
                               ./eikonal/cg/cg_common.cpp
                               ./eikonal/cg/cg_polygon.cpp
                               ./eikonal/cg/cg_tetrahedron.cpp
                               ./eikonal/cg/cg_distance.cpp
                               
                               ./eikonal/ls/ls_geometric.cpp
                               ./eikonal/ls/ls_minimize.cpp
                               ./eikonal/ls/ls_test.cpp
                               ./eikonal/ls/ls_gsl.cpp

                               ./eikonal/gs/gs_connectivity.cpp
                               ./eikonal/gs/gs_LpDistanceSorter.cpp
                               ./eikonal/gs/Sorter.cpp
                               ./eikonal/gs/Solver.cpp
                               ./eikonal/gs/LinMinSolver.cpp
                               ./eikonal/gs/LinNewtonSolver.cpp
                               ./eikonal/gs/HermiteSolver.cpp
                               ./eikonal/gs/FMMSolver.cpp
                              
                               ./eikonal/test/test_common.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/Seeder.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/Problem.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/UnitSquareMeshGenerator.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/GmshMeshGenerator.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/RectangleMeshGenerator.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/linear_test.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/HermiteTest.cpp
                               ./eikonal/test/hermite_test.cpp
)
# Target libraries
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${DOLFIN_LIBRARIES}
${DOLFIN_3RD_PARTY_LIBRARIES} -lgsl -lgslcblas -lm)
